import React, { useState } from 'react' import { OrderTest } from '../../model/OrderTest' interface Props{ orderTest:OrderTest } export default function ItemOrderList(props:Props) { // const [total,setTotal]=useState(0) const sumToTal = ()=>{ let total=0 props.orderTest.listOrder.forEach(item => { total+=item.price*item.quantity }); return total } return (
